body: Can we get rid of all those `*_based` decorators and just always use `torch.jit._tracing` to decide which path to take? It's probably even cheaper than using the first arg.
body_html: Can we get rid of all those *_based decorators and just always use torch.jit._tracing to decide which path to take? It's probably even cheaper than using the first arg.
